jd:
Role: Dot Net Developer

Strong knowledge of the .NET platform and coding practices for mid-tier/integration tier applications that perform business logic and integrations.
Proven experience as Senior .NET Developer including hands-on Development with large-scale enterprise-wide projects.
Experience in conversion projects from legacy to modern applications (mostly looking for integration legacy platforms to Custom .NET Solutions experience).
Experience in building scalable, server-side applications using RESTful APIs, .NET Core stack.
Hands-on experience with the latest .NET core frameworks & Design patterns.
Producing code using .NET languages (C#, REST API, SQL, Asp.NET core).
Analyzing existing systems and migrating to the latest .NET platforms using scalable and loosely coupled services and design patterns.
Experience in designing, developing, and maintaining high-volume transactional systems.
Excellent troubleshooting and communication skills.
